original_title: Blues Run the Game: The Strange Life of Jackson C. Frank
overview: The untold story of Jackson C Frank, an American folk legend. His tragic life produced some of the most timeless folk music of our time.
tagline: Who was Jackson C. Frank? Who remembers him? Where to find meaning, or even light, in a life as dark as his?
title: Blues Run the Game: The Strange Life of Jackson C. Frank
